text: Perth Carriage Servicing Depot is a depot and stabling point located in Perth, Perthshire, Scotland. The depot is on the eastern side of the Highland Main Line, adjacent to Perth station. The depot code is PH. == History == The building was opened by the Caledonian Railway, prior to 1901, as a carriage shed. From 1958 to 1972, Class 06 and 08 shunters and Class 21 locomotives could be seen at the depot. == Present == In 2015 and 2016, the depot had no allocation. It was, instead, a stabling point for Class 37, 47 and 57 locomotives. == References == ===Sources=== * * Category: Railway depots in Scotland
